scripts.honors:update: npm run honors:sync && npm run build
scripts.perf:honors:desktop: npx -y lighthouse http://127.0.0.1:4322/honors --preset=desktop --output html --output json --output-path reports/lighthouse-honors-desktop.html --chrome-flags="--headless --no-sandbox" --no-enable-error-reporting
scripts.perf:honors:provided: npx -y lighthouse http://127.0.0.1:4322/honors --throttling-method=provided --output html --output json --output-path reports/lighthouse-honors-provided.html --chrome-flags="--headless --no-sandbox" --no-enable-error-reporting
